```{r}
Flintdata = read.table("flint-data-simple.csv", header=T, sep="\t")
n = nrow(Flintdata)
ybar = mean(log(Flintdata))
s.2 = var(log(Flintdata))
```

```{r}
post.sigma.2.sim = (n-1)*s.2/rchisq(1000, n-1)
post.mu.sim = rnorm(1000, ybar, sqrt(post.sigma.2.sim/n))
```
